page.text: Being a modern Python library, PyTgCalls requires Python 3.9+ to be installed in your system. We recommend using the latest versions of both Python 3 and pip.

list.item: Get Python 3 from the Python website or use your package manager.
Get pip by following the instructions here.

page.alert: PyTgCalls only supports Python 3, starting from version 3.9.
